install.name: JEZ_Thema
install.author: JoomlaEZ.com

install.description:
JEZ Thema - Professional Joomla! 1.5 Template Framework.

Click here to install sample data as seen in JEZ Thema live demo website.

params.param:
JEZ Thema is not just a pure folders / files structure but a complete Joomla 1.5 template developed to help you create unique, professional Joomla 1.5 template easier and faster.

Please visit JoomlaEZ.com for full features list, editions comparison, licenses comparison, getting started guide, documentation and get support on using / implementing JEZ Thema.

Copyright | Read Me | Getting Started

You can choose to load sample theme to see how JEZ Thema works.

!!! NOTE !!! If sample theme is loaded, its predefined parameters will override appropriated parameters defined below. If you are using JEZ Thema PRO edition, you can see sample theme parameters selection / definition in Dev Mode Panel.

Besides specify default theme above, there are 2 additional ways for switching theme for any frontend page outputed by Joomla using JEZ Thema based template:

  • Via Page Class Suffix

    If enabled, when adding / editing menu item you can specify theme to render page associated with that menu item. This can be done by defining Page Class Suffix parameter in following format tpl_theme@theme-name.
    For example, to use Orange theme for About Us page, you simply need to input tpl_theme@orange as Page Class Suffix for menu item associated with the About Us page.

  • Via URL

    If enabled, theme can be switched right in Joomla frontend for any page by passing variable tpl_theme via URL. See example below for details:
    index.php => Rendered with default theme
index.php?tpl_theme=blue => Switched to Blue theme

index.php?option=com_search => Rendered with default theme
index.php?option=com_search&tpl_theme=green => Switched to Green theme

index.php/contacts.html => Rendered with default theme
index.php/contacts.html?tpl_theme=leaf => Switched to Leaf theme

By enabling dev mode, you can easily turn on/off any position right in frontend via page URL to see how your site looks like when that position is empty or turn on/off any other template parameter, especially effects options, to see the difference.

Enabling dev mode is not recommended for production site.

param.name: dev_rememberParams
param.label: Remember Params
param.description: Use cookie to remember parameters passed in via page URL or form submission

param.name: dev_cookieLifetime
param.label: Cookie Lifetime
param.description: Days to remember parameters passed in via page URL or form submission. 0 to remember till end of current browsing session

param.name: dev_panel
param.label: Dev Mode Panel
param.description: If dev mode is enabled, show dev panel in frontend?

params.param:
Choose 1 from following wrapper formats:

  • No rounded corners

  • Joomla rounded module

    Creates rounded corners the same way as Joomla's technique for rounded module wrapper.

  • Rounded using 6 images with 6 nested divs

    Creates rounded corners the similar way as Joomla's technique for rounded module wrapper but use 6 images and 6 nested divs instead of 4.

  • Rounded using 6 images without nested divs

    Creates rounded corners using schillmania.com's More Rounded Corners With CSS technique.

  • Rounded using 1 image

    Creates rounded corners using schillmania.com's Even More Rounded Corners With CSS technique.

  • Rounded using 1 image with scrollable content

    Using same technique as Rounded using 1 image but scrollable if content is overflown.

param.name: wrapperPage
param.label: Page Wrapper
param.option: Rounded using 6 images with 6 nested divs
Rounded using 6 images without nested divs
Rounded using 1 image with scrollable content

params.param:
Choose 1 from following grids-based layout type:

  • Elastic

    Use em unit for predefined width and height. This enable content box automatically resizable when user changes his/her browser's font size.

  • Fixed

    Use px unit for predefined width and height.

param.name: grids
param.label: Show Grids?
param.description: Display grids of vertical and horizontal lines in frontend to easily align any element correctly. Show grids is not recommended for production site

params.param:
Raw Output is enabled by passing tmpl=component name/value pairs via page URL. Sample uses of Raw Output are pages opened when clicking article's Print and Email icons in Joomla frontend.

Below you can choose whether or not always displaying header and footer in Raw Output page.

Choose 1 from following wrapper formats: no rounded corners, Joomla rounded module, rounded using 6 images with 6 nested divs, rounded using 6 images without nested divs, rounded using 1 image and rounded using 1 image with scrollable content.

Click here for wrapper formats explaination.

param.name: wrapperHeader
param.label: Header Wrapper
param.option: Rounded using 6 images with 6 nested divs
Rounded using 6 images without nested divs
Rounded using 1 image with scrollable content

param.name: wrapperTop
param.label: Top Wrapper
param.option: Rounded using 6 images with 6 nested divs
Rounded using 6 images without nested divs
Rounded using 1 image with scrollable content

params.param:
Choose 1 from following module chromes:

  • Raw output

  • xHTML

    Joomla!'s xhtml module chrome.

  • Rounded

    Joomla!'s rounded module chrome.

  • jezRounded6ImgsNested

    Creates rounded corners the similar way as Joomla!'s rounded module chrome but use 6 images and 6 nested divs instead of 4.

  • jezRounded6Imgs

    Creates rounded corners using schillmania.com's More Rounded Corners With CSS technique.

  • jezRounded1Img

    Creates rounded corners using schillmania.com's Even More Rounded Corners With CSS technique.

  • jezRounded1ImgScroll

    Using same technique as Rounded using 1 image but scrollable if content is overflown.

param.name: modLogo
param.label: Logo Module Position
param.description: No to always display the logo image specified below in this position or yes for auto detect

param.name: modTop
param.label: Top Module Position
param.description: No to always hide or yes for auto detect

param.name: logo
param.label: Site Logo
param.description: Relative path from Joomla root dir to your site's logo image

param.name: topNav
param.label: Top Nav
param.description: Display in-page navigation (links to main content, sub content, local menu, global menu anchors) at header position

param.name: @intro
param.label: Global Navigation Effects
param.description: Use Javascript to create dropdown / flyout effects for global navigation (user3 and user4 positions).

param.name: navFx_fxDuration
param.label: Effect Duration
param.description: Effect duration in milliseconds

param.name: navFx_firstSubDirection
param.label: Dropdown Direction
param.description: Direction of dropdown effect (occured when mouse over first level sub menus): vertical, horizontal or both

param.name: navFx_deeperSubDirection
param.label: Flyout Direction
param.description: Direction of flyout effect (occured when mouse over deeper level / nested sub menus): vertical, horizontal or both

params.param: Whether or not displaying warning for visitor using IE6 browser.

param.name: @intro
param.label: PNG-24 Fix for IE6
param.description: Enable PNG-24 fix for IE6 browser for selected images, images that has class png24, or for all images with extension .png?

param.name: @intro
param.label: Support Hover/Focus in IE6
param.description: By enabling this option, the template will add hover/focus state support for form elements which is lacked support in IE6.

param.name: @intro
param.label: Keep Vertical Rhythm?
param.description: If enabled, the template will automatically add neccessary margin to all images to prevent typography's vertical rhythm broken.

params.param:
Load script which render reflection effect to all images that has class reflect.

Click here for advanced / detailed usage.

param.name: @intro
param.label: (Sub-)domains of Internal Links
param.description: List all (sub-)domains, separated by comma, which belong to your site here to prevent external link style affection.

params.param: Modify link to open in modal window for all <a> elements which match any of following conditions. Besides the options to convert article's PDF, print and email icons links to open in modal window, you can define up to 10 additional custom modal links creation styles below.

param.name: modalPdf
param.label: PDF Icon Link
param.option: Convert to open in modal window

param.name: modalPdfSize

param.description: Modal window size (width x height) in px or % unit for PDF icon link
